author: Demonhunter Tribunal

text: This always gets me teary eyes, mostly because I can relate all too well to how Rudy felt. Being something you never asked to be, always being the outsider, and every time you think people around you are finally accepting you, even liking you, they learn of who you actually are and then you're alone again... I would that at least this piece could inspire some people to not be afraid of difference, or of what someone is and what you are not. We don't need two of me, or two of you in this world... We need one of me... and one of you.

author: UndeadEvilMuffin

text: One of the reasons I'm such a big fan of Naruke is just how fitting to the different scenes her compositions are. It feels like she actually played this game before composing the soundtrack. This particular track fits Rudy (the hero) perfectly well, especially at the beginning of the game since people are afraid of his power and rejects him even when he uses it to protect them. But the theme still evokes a certain hope that, one day, he won't be alone anymore.
author: SupraDarky
